Asked if cocoa exports were in the meantime continuing, he said:`` I can not comment on this.''

Allen Iverson had 32 points and 12 assists Wednesday night, and the Nuggets used a late run to beat the Grizzlies 106-102. This was a Shaquille O'Neal win for us at somebody else's home, Allen Iverson said.`` Down seven points with 3 minutes to go. It was a gut check for us.
